reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed for 5 nights in a 1 bedroom apartment. All the of the features you would expect were on hand. TV in main room & also bedroom. Our room had a canal view from both the small balcony and the bedroom. While the apartment was for 2 people it did have extra space that had a foldout lounge & cupboards, which I though a bit odd as there is only one bathroom & toilet. Also the bathroom has no seperate door which meant closing bedroom door & closing balcony drapes when wishing to have some privacy in the toilet.
reviews.title: Modern & clean

reviews.text: Bed was 2 king singles pushed together and pillows flat.
reviews.title: A perfect Stay
Business/holiday trip
reviews.text: Nice pool & spa area. A small jetty for fishing & easy walk to broadbeach eateries & casino. A small cafe does breakfast & lunch.

A perfect weekend away. We were unsure about staying in a ground floor but were amazed at the wonderful River view from every room in the apartment. It set the mood for a relaxing weekend. We are seasoned travellers so were surprised there was no noise from other guests or traffic etc..so plenty of sleep-ins !! The staff were friendly and professional and the apartment was immaculate. Thoroughly enjoyed our stay and cant wait to go back.
reviews.title: Nice and super friendly staff.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: On a business/holiday trip we were booked into Freshwater for the business part of our trip, not by choice. I was a little sceptical after reading a number of reviews and decided that if we were not happy once our business part of our trip was finished, we would book in elsewhere for our holiday.
reviews.title: Just Right

reviews.text: Just got back from 7 nights with our 4 kids. Was not expecting too much as the price was VERY decent, but when we got there it was just beautiful! The room was enormous, facilities very clean.... Im very surprised by the people complaining about the no toilet paper, washing liquid ect as im a little confused at to what they thought they were going to when the facility ADVERTISES - FULL SELF CATERING apartment..... ... if you want to juggle some numbers around jupiters casino is actually more expensive and you would have nothing other than a room and 2 x double beds (this is where most of our friends stayed and they nearly died when visiting us who paid $200 less for the week)
reviews.title: Amazing!

reviews.text: Reception was friendly, the cafe downstairs is pricey so I wouldnt eat there. Pool and Gym facilities very clean.
reviews.title: Overcharged for a filthy dirty room and facilities

reviews.text: We will definately be returning
reviews.title: Very comfortable stay, no hassles, excellent location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We chose to stay here as we had done a year ago. This time the price was higher but we did accept that when we booked, however to find out 3 weeks before the rooms were half price was a slap in the face and when we made contact the response was bad luck. As we had paid in advance for 10 nights we he no option but to stay there. One we arrived we got our key OK and then when we got to the room the carpet were dirty the lounges had stains on them the bathrooms were shocking they had build up of scum in the showers drains smelt and the drain covers were dirty. When the children wanted to swim the advice offered of getting a towel for the pool was not available as they had no pool towels one day would be OK but to be without pool towels for two days was crazy. The common areas in the walkways had no air moving through them at all so made a very warm uncomfortable atmosphere. Most staff were pleasant to deal with (with the exveption of a grumpy lady on reception) but nothing was done to
reviews.title: Modern, comfortable, convenient

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: rectify based on this terrible experience I would not recommend this for others an we will not be staying here again. Sorry for the long post
reviews.title: New meaning of Self-Catering

reviews.text: Having read prior reviews of dirty rooms and rude staff I was expecting the worst of Freshwater Point.
reviews.title: Very Pleasantly Surprised

reviews.text: I needn't have worried as the property was the perfect base for our Gold Coast holiday. The room was large, comfortable, spotlessly clean and well equipped. It's important to note this is a Self Catering property, if you want your room cleaned daily and your toilet rolls replenished go somewhere else.
reviews.title: Large rooms, quiet location, night staff rude

reviews.text: The location is great, close enough to walk to the amenities at Broadbeach but far enough away to avoid the noise. It's around half an hour from the theme parks.
reviews.title: Disappointing - Accor Vacation club member

reviews.text: We found the staff friendly and helpful, our son needed to go to the doctors and they assisted us finding a local clinic.
reviews.title: $92 e tra charge to put dishes away

reviews.text: The property also has a large pool, cafe, gym and BBQ area.
reviews.title: Very Surprised

reviews.text: We recently occupied a standard 2BR apartment for 7 nights on a hotel chain reward scheme ; our experience was a mixed bag. The current daily rate, circa $210 according to TA links, seems very reasonable - but the alleged in-season full price, over $400, is not good value in our opinion.
reviews.title: Good rather than very good ........but good's not an option !

reviews.text: The bathroom design which affords no privacy( no door and large panel window with louvre blind ) is an architectural stupidity which could be easily and cost-effectively improved if Freshwater is of a mind to do so. Don't hold your breath. The lounge area carpet is stretched and needs re-fitting while the suite fabric is stained and needs steam-cleaning, at least. Chipped crockery had not been replaced which is irritating given Freshwater demands that on departure dirty dishes must be in the dishwasher, breakages declared and all rubbish removed to the chute or basement bins - otherwise you will be slapped with a penalty charge !
reviews.title: Great Views!!! Close Proximity!!!

reviews.text: We understand other reviewers negative comments about consumables not being replenished or sold at a friendly cost - but this is normal practise in a self - contained let. The pool towel charge is silly, though.
reviews.title: Conference and accommodation

reviews.text: Staff ? - well, we had good experiences with a terrific male night manager and equally helpful maintenance man while a cafe female was unnecessarily full of herself. Reception staff failed to meet published weekend opening hours.
reviews.title: Conferencing at Freshwater Point Resort

reviews.text: The location, modernity, undercover secure parking and heated pools with good outdoor furniture are noteworthy positive features of Freshwater.
reviews.title: Lovely Family Holiday
